TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapReflectionImporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 從 .NET Framework 型別或 Web 服務方法資訊產生 SOAP 編碼訊息的對應。

span.span: Generates mappings to SOAP-encoded messages from .NET Framework types or Web service method information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供型別對應至 SOAP 編碼訊息部分的 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中所定義。The class provides type mappings to SOAP-encoded message parts, as defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 它只適用於 Web 服務或用戶端指定 SOAP 編碼的 SOAP 1.1 規格第 5 節中所述。It is used only when a Web service or client specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`欄位和成員`GroupType`列舉型別會覆寫。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已建立，且每個覆寫的成員或列舉型別、以適當的屬性設定，然後新增至建立。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用建立，而且用來建立會覆寫預設的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

span.span: A object that overrides how the class serializes mapped types using SOAP encoding.

summary.span: 產生 .NET Framework 型別之 XML 結構描述項目的對應。

span.span: Generates a mapping to an XML Schema element for a .NET Framework type.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping (string elementName, string ns, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping(string elementName, string ns, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members) cil managed
Public Function ImportMembersMapping (elementName As String, ns As String, members As XmlReflectionMember()) As XmlMembersMapping

public: System::Xml::Serialization::XmlMembersMapping ^ ImportMembersMapping(System::String ^ elementName, System::String ^ ns, cli::array <System::Xml::Serialization::XmlReflectionMember ^> ^ members);

param.name: elementName
param.span: 從 Web 服務方法產生的 XML 項目名稱。

span.span: An XML element name produced from the Web service method.

param.name: ns
param.span: 從 Web 服務方法產生的 XML 項目命名空間。

span.span: An XML element namespace produced from the Web service method.

param.name: members
param.span: 屬於 Web 服務方法之 .NET Framework 程式碼實體 (Entity) 的陣列。

span.span: An array of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method.

summary.span: 針對從 Web 服務方法所收集的資訊，產生內部型別對應。

span.span: Generates internal type mappings for information that is gathered from a Web service method.

returns.span: WSDL 訊息定義之項目部分的內部 .NET Framework 型別對應。

span.span: Internal .NET Framework type mappings to the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化 Web 服務或用戶端，或反映的 Web 服務時呼叫方法。The method is called while initializing a Web service or client, or reflecting a Web service. 您不需要直接呼叫它。You do not need to call it directly. 下列清單將描述可能的值為`members`參數：The following list describes possible values for the `members` parameter: - Web 服務方法的輸入的參數。Web service method input parameters. - Web 服務方法輸出參數，加上傳回的型別，如果不是 void，索引位置為零。Web service method output parameters, plus the return type, if not void, at index zero. - SOAP 標頭輸入。SOAP input headers. - SOAP 輸出標頭。SOAP output headers.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping (string elementName, string ns, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping(string elementName, string ns, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors) cil managed
Public Function ImportMembersMapping (elementName As String, ns As String, members As XmlReflectionMember(), hasWrapperElement As Boolean, writeAccessors As Boolean) As XmlMembersMapping

public: System::Xml::Serialization::XmlMembersMapping ^ ImportMembersMapping(System::String ^ elementName, System::String ^ ns, cli::array <System::Xml::Serialization::XmlReflectionMember ^> ^ members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors);

param.name: elementName
param.span: 從 Web 服務方法產生的 XML 項目名稱。

span.span: An XML element name produced from the Web service method.

param.name: ns
param.span: 從 Web 服務方法產生的 XML 項目命名空間。

span.span: An XML element namespace produced from the Web service method.

param.name: members
param.span: 屬於 Web 服務方法之 .NET Framework 程式碼實體 (Entity) 的陣列。

span.span: An array of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method.

param.name: hasWrapperElement
param.span: 表示對應於 WSDL 訊息部分的項目應該封入 SOAP 訊息的額外包裝函式項目中，否則為 。

span.span: to indicate that elements that correspond to WSDL message parts should be enclosed in an extra wrapper element in a SOAP message; otherwise, .

param.name: writeAccessors
param.span: 表示 RPC 樣式的 Web 服務繫結，而 則表示文件樣式的 Web 服務繫結或 SOAP 標頭。

span.span: to indicate an RPC-style Web service binding; to indicate a document-style Web service binding or a SOAP header.

summary.span: 傳回物件，此物件是用來從某個型別對應至使用指定之型別的 XML 表示。

span.span: Returns an object that is used to map from a type to an XML representation using the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping ImportTypeMapping (Type type);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping ImportTypeMapping(class System.Type type) cil managed
public: System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTypeMapping ^ ImportTypeMapping(Type ^ type);

param.name: type
param.span: 要為其產生類型對應的 .NET Framework 類型。

span.span: The .NET Framework type for which to generate a type mapping.

summary.span: 產生 .NET Framework 型別之 XML 結構描述項目的對應。

span.span: Generates a mapping to an XML Schema element for a .NET Framework type.

returns.span: 某個類型與 XML 結構描述項目的內部 .NET Framework 對應。

span.span: Internal .NET Framework mapping of a type to an XML Schema element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 SOAP 編碼序列化的 XML 結構描述項目。The XML Schema element is serialized using SOAP encoding. 您不需要呼叫直接的方法。You do not need to call the method directly.

param.name: type
param.span: 要為其儲存類型對應資訊的 .NET Framework 類型。

span.span: The .NET Framework type for which to save type mapping information.

summary.span: 將型別的對應置於 執行個體的內容，以便稍後叫用匯入方法時使用。

span.span: Places mappings for a type in the instance's context for later use when import methods are invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要呼叫直接的方法。You do not need to call the method directly.

summary.span: 將衍生型別 (Derived Type) 的對應置於 執行個體的內容，以便稍後叫用匯入方法時使用。

span.span: Places mappings for derived types in the instance's context for later use when import methods are invoked.
